content.raw:
Update: Added symbol visibility to the generated messages and several tweaks to the CMakeLists. Thanks to @costashatz and @nkoenig for helping. 32ea12c

~~There's some problem compiling on Windows. Working on it.~~ It works on Windows again.

Each time I make a piece of code to compile on Windows I feel I deserve a Turing Award.
content.html:
Update: Added symbol visibility to the generated messages and several tweaks to the CMakeLists. Thanks to @costashatz and @nkoenig for helping. 32ea12c

There's some problem compiling on Windows. Working on it. It works on Windows again.

Each time I make a piece of code to compile on Windows I feel I deserve a Turing Award.
